title: Gwendolin

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Scorch a person at night, dealing a Basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After you get one kill, you will burn anyone who survives, reducing their defense by one stage permanently and dealing an Astral Basic attack to them the next night.
- After you get two kills, your burn renders anyone who survives Protection Immune as well.
- After you get three kills, you may throw a cocktail, attacking and burning anyone who visits your target. (Two Uses)
- After you get five kills, you may release a Firestorm, reducing all levels of defense by two for the night to a minimum of Vulnerable. Monkeys are unaffected. (One Use)
- If you get seven kills before you use Firestorm, you may reduce to a minimum of Fragile instead. (see 2182)
- You have Overkill attack against Everfrost members.
- Cannot spawn with Monkey (Primary).
